FUTURE MEXICANA ROUTES
PASSENGER INFORMATION
CHILDREN:
Half fare will be charged for each child two years of age or
over, but under 12, and the child
will be entitled to occupy a seat. One
infant (a child under two years of age) will be transported
free with an
adult passenger, but will not be entitled to a seat. Each additional infant,
or one occupying a seat, will be charged 50% of the adult fare.
CHARGES FOR LATE CANCELLATION ON
DOMESTIC SERVICES:
a). Full
refund when the reserved space is cancelled 24 hours prior to departure
of the flight.
b). 25%
charge if the cancellation is made less than 24
hours but more than 3 hours prior to departure of flight (*).
c). 50%
charge if the cancellation is either made less than 3 hours prior to depar-
ture of the flight or if the passengers fail to appear at the airport (*). d).
For groups of more than 10 people, a special
request
details.
regulation applies. Please
(*)
These charges will apply only on that portion of the flight for which
reservations have been made.
In order to avoid these charges, we request
our customers that if their trip is not going to be made, to please cancel
reservations as far in advance as possible.
RECONFIRMATIONS ON INTERNATIONAL SERVICES
Return or continuing
reservations must be reconfirmed after a stopover, not later than 72 hours
before departure time. Unless this notice of intention to use such return
or continuing reservations is received by Mexicana or an authorized agent
72 hours or more prior to departure time,
the previously confirmed re-
servations will be automatically cancelled. Passengers making reconfirma-
fions must indicate an address or telephone number at
which they may
be reached in the city where the plane is to be boarded.
BAGGAGE:
All international passengers, including half fares, will be al-
lowed 20 kilos (44 pounds) except passengers to
from LOS ANGELES who
will be allowed 25 kilos (55 pounds) baggage free of charge.
domestic flights all passengers.
including half fares,
On
СМА
will be allowed 25
kilos (55 pounds) baggage free of charge.
CHECK IN
TIME
Passengers must be at the airport at least 45 minutes
prior to the scheduled departure time for domestic flights and 60 minutes
for international flights. Carrier assumes no liability in case of passengers
who arrive later than stipulated here, and cannot be transported.
FARES AND SCHEDULES:
All fares and schedules shown herein are for
information purpose only, and are subject to change and correction with
out notice.
